name: Topics in Comparative Politics V
description: Selected issues in comparative politics. Content and instructor varies from year to year. (Given by the Department of Political Science and the Centre for European, Russian and Eurasian Studies)
prerequisites: 2.0 POL credits in comparative politics. See the Department’s website http://politics.utoronto.ca/undergraduate/courses/fallwinter-timetable/ for POL courses by area group.
